FAQ.question: How do I contact customer service?
FAQ.answer: You can reach customer service at 1-800-555-1234. (Hours: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST).

FAQ.question: What products are available for purchase today?
FAQ.answer: You can view our full product catalog on our website, where we list all available items, including new arrivals and bestsellers.

FAQ.question: How do I track my order?
FAQ.answer: You can track your order by logging into your account and visiting the 'Orders' section. You'll find the tracking information next to your recent purchase.

FAQ.question: What is the return policy?
FAQ.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on most products. Items must be in their original condition and packaging. Visit our returns page for more details.

FAQ.question: How can I apply a discount code to my order?
FAQ.answer: You can apply a discount code during checkout. Simply enter the code in the 'Discount Code' field and click 'Apply' before completing your purchase.

FAQ.question: Do you offer free shipping?
FAQ.answer: Yes, we offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50. Expedited shipping options are available for an additional cost.

FAQ.question: Can I change or cancel my order after it has been placed?
FAQ.answer: You can modify or cancel your order within the first 24 hours of placing it by contacting customer service. After this time, we may not be able to accommodate changes.

FAQ.question: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Swagstore gift cards. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

FAQ.question: Do you offer gift wrapping services?
FAQ.answer: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for a small additional fee. You can select this option during checkout.

FAQ.question: How can I leave feedback or report an issue with a product?
FAQ.answer: You can leave feedback on the product page or contact customer service directly to report any issues. We value your input and are happy to assist.
